name: Super Mega Bread
description:
Butter your way to victory!

In the not-too-distant world of BreadLand, Bread Man must hurry and save the land from the nefarious Dr. Yogurt! Along the way, Bread Man will face opposition from the snacks which Dr. Yogurt has spread through the land to process and pollute BreadLand, but he can overcome them through the power of butter!

Collect sticks of butter which you can use to defeat enemies, hit switches, or even jump in mid-air! As long as you have butter, you can blast through the air and overcome even the most daunting of challenges!

Run through all four levels and try to get a record time, or try to find the secrets and unlock new modes.

The game comes with music from the game, in both the original chiptune versions and remade renditions. 

This game is made for the Pico-8 Fantasy Console. However, this game can be played in a browser without the need to own a copy of Pico-8.
